content.html: 🚨 1 WEEK! 🚨 Join us next Monday for this year's #NottTechParty 🎉 We'll have games, quizzes, special guests and prizes! 🎁 It's free and there's no need to register, so see you there on the 6th of December at 6:30pm 🎄🎅✨ nott.tech/xmas21
content.value:
🚨 1 WEEK! 🚨

Join us next Monday for this year's #NottTechParty 🎉

We'll have games, quizzes, special guests and prizes! 🎁
It's free and there's no need to register, so see you there on the 6th of December at 6:30pm 🎄🎅✨

nott.tech/xmas21

photo.alt: A graphic the Nottingham Tech Christmas party prizes. The tagline is "the lockdown tech most hyped by the community", and you can see pictures of a wacom tablet, an air fryer, a heated blanket and a blue yeti microphone.
